original_text: Now at the end of the days that the king had said he should bring them in, then the prince of the eunuchs brought them in before Nebuchadnezzar.
korean_text: 왕이 말한 대로 그들을 불러들일 기한이 찼으므로 환관장이 그들을 느부갓네살 앞으로 데리고 가니

sentences.original_text: Now at the end of days
that the king had said he should bring them in
then the prince of the eunuchs brought them in
